reviews.text: As this is a moderately priced hotel, we did not expect the very high standard that we experienced there.
reviews.title: Amazingly good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went to Hannover for New Years Eve (Silvester). We booked the day before and although we were unable to book a double room as there were none available, we booked a non-smoking suite. The price wasn't too bad and I liked the idea of having a suite.
reviews.title: Great price, great hotel, awful service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we arrived we discovered our suite was in fact smoking, it stank. My partner (German) was upset and he asked the receptionist to move us. She said there was only one other choice, a non-smoking double room but we would have to pay the same price as the suite. We wanted to book the non-smoking double but had been told there was none available! We ended up staying in the suite, at least we would get our moneys worth.
reviews.title: Superb Location - Rooms Could Do With Upgrade

reviews.text: The interior was clean but very dated, the shower good (although the screen only covered half of it so water went all over the floor) and the beds comfortable. There were no tea or coffee making facilities, and we did not get the complimentary drink from the bar that was promised when we booked. The gym that I had been looking forward to using was not within the hotel but a ten minute walk away - and it didn't open until 10.30am.
reviews.title: Some positives, but LOUD

reviews.text: The location was great for us as we were taking the train and it is right behind the station (though in a dodgy area), however not terribly aesthetically pleasing. Though it is very close to the municipal park which is a lovely walk (or run in my case).
reviews.title: Beware - unsecure hotel

likes.disliked: — Feeling Unsafe, no help from staff, unwillingness to make things right after the stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A good business/conference hotel with most if not all that you would expect to go with that. Little by way of lobby/lounge/bar facilities. Comfortable room with good amenities. Well serviced.
reviews.title: Practical

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good quality buffet breakfast with good variety of hot and cold dishes frequently refreshed and restocked.
reviews.title: Nothing to Dislike, Good All-Rounder
79E for a "suite". Ja danke.
reviews.text: Paid underground parking via a less- than-modern lift that was out of service as we wanted to leave!
Very close to main railway station, good access from inner ring road and reasonable walk to city centre. Immediate surroundings less than attractive (including rough sleepers in public space nearby).
reviews.title: Nice stay
Convenient location but not particularly comfortable
